title: num plus equals num then num times equals num

choices.label: The value of num is the square its original value.
The value of num is two times the square of its original value.
The value of num is the square of twice its original value.
It cannot be determined without knowing the initial value of num.

content.answer: The value of num is the square of twice its original value.

skill.text: 4.A: Describe the behavior of a code segment or program.
